name: Moonlight Energy 2
overview: Moonlight Energy 2 is a sequel to Moonlight Energy. The game's premise is nearly identical to that of the predecessor: the player controls a high school student named Maki, participating in her lesbian escapades with other students or personnel. Unlike the first game, this is a visual novel with minimal interaction. The player is only occasionally prompted to make a choice for Maki. Some of the scenes, in particular sexual ones, are animated.
